page.title: 11Town Clerk of Much Wenlock.
page.content: {Mrs. Downes,}the present{Town Clerk, took office in{1980.}She found it a difficult job to begin with as she had to accept a lot of responsibility. One of her jobs is to{work out how {much the rates will be.}This has to be done in December or January ready for the new financial year which begins in April. {On the first Thursday of each month Mrs. Downes{attends the Council {meeting}and writes the minutes of the meeting. Mrs. Downes also{keeps the Mayor's {diary}and{looks after his official {costume. The job of Town Clerk is supposed to be half time-about 16 hours a week but sometimes she works longer than this. The Town Clerk's{official costume}is a {long, black cloak,}with velvet insets and a{white wig.
